U

UserProfile - Class in com.example.cmput301f24mikasa
Represents a user's profile containing their personal details and the events they have joined.
UserProfile() - Constructor for class com.example.cmput301f24mikasa.UserProfile
Default constructor required by Firestore for deserialization.
UserProfile(String, String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class com.example.cmput301f24mikasa.UserProfile
Constructor with profile picture provided.
UserProfileActivity - Class in com.example.cmput301f24mikasa
Activity for managing the user's profile, including updating personal details (name, email, phone number), uploading/removing profile images, and saving the profile to Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage.
UserProfileActivity() - Constructor for class com.example.cmput301f24mikasa.UserProfileActivity
Default constructor for UserProfileActivity.
UserProfileArrayAdapter - Class in com.example.cmput301f24mikasa
Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying a list of UserProfile objects in a ListView.

Constructor for UserProfileArrayAdapter.
UserProfileManager - Class in com.example.cmput301f24mikasa
Singleton class for managing the UserProfile throughout the application.
